channel.description:
[QUOTE=Grey Acumen] So far, I've only been unable to save the scientists that keep getting eaten by the vents (bodycount = +4) and teh scientist that falls from the ladder in the elevator shaft (bodycount = +1) There's also the scientist that kills the headcrab at the beginning of the game before getting attacked by another, but I SHOULD be able to save him, since it is possible to grab a flare, and toss it at the headcrab before it attacks him, but the headcrab just doesn't register the hit, so (bodycount = +1) [/QUOTE] This post gave me an idea for a new achievement:
[b]Abe's attitude[/b]
Bring n scientists(or barneys) from point A to B
n: number of npc you have to escort.
title: a reference to [url='https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Abe_(Oddworld)']Abe's oddysee/exoddus[/url] ![](upload://6WhtKvANakvj8eVn9J8brM6qB3R.jpeg)
I haven't figure out yet which part of BM would fit...
I was thinking at Office complex chapter...
[b]What do you think?[/b] have you a better title for the ach.? have you an idea where place it?
I Hope they're gonna add this to Steam release...

Grey Acumen:

I don’t really like the escort mission side of things.

This ach. is not releted to rpg escort mission:
in abe’s games an importan part of gameplay is saving friendly npc.

Ronster:

To create a special piece of dialog somthing to happen and get an achievement for it would be better

I doubt that devs will do it…
Maybe they can use some existing dialog…

I was thinking at something easier to develop:

here is some ideas

Abe’s attitude

  1. Bring n scientists(or barneys) to the end of a map

or

  1. Gather a group of n npc
    [NO CHEATS!]

or

  1. Escort n npc to a vending machine
